definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to work high above the ground

pinyin: mu4 biao1 pi3 pei4 zuo4 ye4
wang3 lu4 zuo4 ye4 xi4 tong3
ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 zuo4 ye4

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 当她回到家中之后，她首先做了暑假作业。

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你们每天都做家庭作业吗？

sentences.english: I have a homework about HTML need you for help. My group member can not do it!
sentences.chinese: 我有一个网页制作的作业需要你帮忙。

sentences.english: One day Mrs. Slaton gave the class an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，斯莱顿夫人给全班同学布置了一项作业。

sentences.english: Even so, some teachers still gave us homework.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，有些老师还是布置了寒假作业。

sentences.english: Able to work under pressure, working independently, willingness to work overtime or work with shift.
sentences.chinese: 具抗压性，能独立作业，并配合加班及轮班。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作业含量，对过程流程不引起更改。

sentences.english: My teacher arranged me homework and asked me to make a bargain with a stranger who looks like a black sheep.
sentences.chinese: 老师给我布置了一个作业，让我和看起来像败家子。

sentences.english: Do you have angry fights over homework or how much TV children can watch?
sentences.chinese: 你是否会因作业和看电视的多少和孩子怄气呢？

sentences.english: You should make clear the operation item and the time of start your engine in emergency case in your application.
sentences.chinese: 船方申请材料需说明作业项目和应急备车时间。

sentences.english: Failing to find her homework, Jill is just like a cat on a hot tin roof.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔的作业找不到了，急得像热锅上的蚂蚁。

sentences.english: Write it in your workbooks and give it in tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 写在你的作业本上明天交上来。

sentences.english: But experience had taught him not to proffer academic work as an excuse.
sentences.chinese: 不过经验告诉他，文化课作业打发不了爸爸的要求。

sentences.english: Because i have a lot of housework.
sentences.chinese: 因为我有很多的寒假作业还没做完。

sentences.english: The sand bailer is also used as a bottom hole sampler.
sentences.chinese: 捞砂筒也可用作业井底取样器。

sentences.english: I'm frustrated that I can't concentrate on my homework.
sentences.chinese: 我没法把注意力集中在我的作业上，真令人泄气。

definition: to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to stay behind (after class)/to be given detention/detention
to dismiss students at the end of the school day
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
